reviewText: #1 anime
This anime is amazing!  These episodes are the best ones yet!!  Cant wait for part 21 (:
It's a fun, fantastic Anime that everybody could get into!

Fairy Tail is the greatest anime ever! This box set will once again prove that! Even if you don't think it's the greatest, it will still impress you there's no question about that.  Sunvillage, and Tartaros are featured in this set.
Now the story arc begins
I can't wait for the last installment.
I am a big fan of Anime.  This has an excellent story line and I love the artwork as well.
Item was in perfect condition played great. Basically had no issues.
Loved it
Best Anime Series
Fairy Tail has to be one of myvery favorite anime

MORE AND MORE GREAT FAIRY TAIL!!!
I love Fairy Tail and these episodes take the guild from the euphoria of winning the grand magic games to something sinister beginning to unfold!
Great series!!
Amazing anime series, if you are a Fairy Tail fan or someone looking for an anime with good laughs, loads of humor, action and feelings you got to have this one :-)
Good stuff

I hate having to give this only 3 stars, but that's the way it goes.
Story is great!, but of the 24:41 minutes of each episode. Over 9+mins are recap, intro song, and ending credits.....it's a waste, and really annoying!
